org.bennedum.transporter.api

Interface RemotePlayer


  • public interface RemotePlayer
    Represents an online player on a remote server.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getDisplayName()
      Returns the player's display name.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the player's name.
      void getRemoteLocation(Callback<RemoteLocation> cb)
      Returns the location where the player is located.
      RemoteServer getRemoteServer()
      Returns the server where the player is located.
      RemoteWorld getRemoteWorld()
      Returns the world where the player is located.
      void sendMessage(Callback<java.lang.Void> cb, java.lang.String msg)
      Sends a message to the player.
      void sendPM(org.bukkit.entity.Player fromPlayer, java.lang.String message)
      Sends a private message to the player.
      void sendRawMessage(Callback<java.lang.Void> cb, java.lang.String msg)
      Sends a raw message to the player.
